text: Mandra Junction railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Mandra village, Rawalpindi district of Punjab province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Rawalpindi District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1) Category:Railway stations on Mandra–Bhaun Railway Line
title: Mandra Junction railway station
